name: Caveman Pong
description:
"I really feel like it has the potential to be the next Flappy Bird-like schoolyard phenomenon." - Jared Nelson, TouchArcade.com

Update: Now the Pong is a bit slower at the start. Also a new Yellow Critter is added. A new Leaderboard will be used!

========================================

Caveman is hitting the Pong at the cliff face by himself.

1) Time his jump to block the Pong.
2) Tap to make him jump. He scores every time he blocks the pong. Don't let the Pong get pass him!
3) If the Pong bounce low, he doesn't need to jump.

But watch out for the Critters! They will come out of the their hole and mess Caveman's game! Different colour Critters will different things to the Pong.

This is super addictive!
